label: manufacturerParty
comment: A manufacturer party for this production process.
A manufacturer party for this specified material.
A manufacturer party for this trade product.
A manufacturer party related to this facility production unit.
A manufacturer party, at line level, for this trade agreement.
The manufacturer party for this OEM equipment.
The manufacturer party for this logistics means of transport.
The manufacturer party for this monitoring sensor.
The manufacturer party of this monitoring IOT device.
The manufacturer party specified for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The party which manufactured this supply chain consignment item.

rangeIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.

domainIncludes.comment: Hardware or software typically marketed by a company other than the original manufacturer.
An IOT (Internet of Things) piece of mechanical or electronic equipment which can collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data.
The contractual terms of a line trade agreement.
The devices used to convey goods or other objects from place to place during logistics cargo movements.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
A defined set of production processes under the single management of a facility.
An object which can detect and measure physical properties and which can record, indicate and transmit such measurements.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
